1610580.name: Unforgettable You - Supporter Bonus DLC
1610580.description:
Thanks for supporting us in making games!

The game will always be free! This DLC is an optional extra for supporters of our games as a token of appreciation.

This DLC unlocks a new option in the settings menu where you can;
- change the background image of the level select screen.
- change the appearance of the player into a raptor or a mech.

This DLC will not add more levels, story or gameplay.

We hope to deliver more stories in the future. Your donation will make that possible!
1610580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
